text: Galletas pesquera, often simply called galletas or galyetas, are Filipino biscuits. They are characteristically very thin and disc-shaped, usually with three or more small perforations. They are popular in Tagalog and Ilonggo regions. ==See also== *Broas *Galletas de patatas *Galletas del Carmen *Roscas == References == Category:Philippine pastries Category:Biscuits
title: Galletas pesquera
